title: BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max All in One Wet-Dry Vacuum Cleaner and Mop for Hard Floors and Area Rugs, Black, 2554A
descriptions:
### Transform Your Home with the BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max All in One Wet-Dry Vacuum Cleaner and Mop!

Introducing the BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max, the ultimate cleaning solution for your home! This all-in-one wet-dry vacuum and mop is designed to keep your hard floors and area rugs looking their best, all with the convenience of a cordless design.

#### Key Features:

**Effortless Cleaning:**
- **Rotating Brush System:** The CrossWave Cordless Max features a powerful rotating brush system that effectively cleans and scrubs your floors, removing even the most stubborn dirt and grime.
- **10.5 Inch Cleaning Path Width:** A wide cleaning path ensures that you cover more area in less time, making it perfect for quick clean-ups.
- **Swivel Head:** The swivel head allows for easy maneuvering around furniture and in tight spaces, ensuring a thorough clean in every corner of your home.

**Versatile and Efficient:**
- **Cordless Freedom:** Powered by a 36V Lithium-Ion battery, the CrossWave Cordless Max offers up to 30 minutes of continuous cleaning time, giving you the freedom to clean without the hassle of cords.
- **Two-Tank Technology:** The 28 oz clean water tank and 18.6 oz dirt tank ensure that you can clean and vacuum simultaneously, without mixing dirty and clean water.
- **Improved Edge Cleaning:** The CrossWave Cordless Max is designed to clean right up to the edges, leaving no area untouched.

**Smart and Convenient:**
- **Wi-Fi Connected:** Connect to the BISSELL Connect app to monitor and control your cleaning, receive maintenance alerts, and access cleaning tips.
- **Self-Cleaning Cycle:** After youâ€™re done cleaning, simply activate the self-cleaning cycle to rinse and clean the brush roll, saving you time and effort.

**Multi-Surface Compatibility:**
- **Versatile for Various Surfaces:** The CrossWave Cordless Max is perfect for a variety of surfaces, including tile, sealed wood floors, laminate, linoleum, rubber floor mats, pressed wood floors, and area rugs.
- **Multi-Surface and Hard Floor Sanitize Formulas:** Included are 2 Multi-Surface Trial Formulas and 2 Hard Floor Sanitize Trial Formulas to help you tackle different cleaning needs.

**User-Friendly Design:**
- **Carry Handle:** The built-in carry handle makes it easy to move the CrossWave Cordless Max from room to room.
- **Included Accessories:** Comes with 2 Multi-Surface Brush Rolls to ensure optimal performance and longevity of your cleaner.

**Support a Good Cause:**
- **BISSELL Pet Foundation:** With every purchase, you support the BISSELL Pet Foundation, a charity dedicated to helping pets in need find loving homes.

#### Why Choose the BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max?
- **All-in-One Solution:** Vacuum and mop in one go, saving you time and effort.
- **Powerful Performance:** Designed to tackle tough messes and leave your floors looking spotless.
- **Convenience and Control:** Wi-Fi connectivity and a self-cleaning cycle make maintenance a breeze.
- **Eco-Friendly:** The reusable and washable filter helps reduce waste.
- **Charitable Impact:** Your purchase supports a noble cause, making a difference in the lives of pets and their families.

Transform your cleaning routine with the BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max. Order yours today and experience the ultimate in home cleaning convenience and efficiency!
